mapper.select: select reply_num, exh_seq, reply_content, member_id, reply_reg_date, reply_update_date from exhibition_reply where exh_seq = #{exh_seq} order by reply_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into exhibition_reply (reply_num, exh_seq, reply_content, member_id, reply_reg_date) values(seq_exhibition_reply.nextval,#{exh_seq}, #{reply_content}, #{member_id}, sysdate + 9/24)
mapper.update: update exhibition_reply set reply_content = #{reply_content}, reply_update_date = sysdate + 9/24 where reply_num = #{reply_num}
